events.name: Learn the Ways to Become A Successful Homepreneur
events.description:
Ever thought of learning how to run an online business from home? But don't know how? Jeeann Kuan was an awarding winning ex-Ministry of Education (Singapore) teacher who quit her job to be a stay at home mum and started her own online business at home and generated more than 12 million US$ in just over 1 year...
Today she goes around sharing and empowering stay home mothers and dads to start their own online business too...
Jeeann will be sharing:1. The cheapest way to start your business online even without IT skills2. What business should you start online3. How to start your own online business without having to buy stocks or ship products4. What are the latest trends online proven to make money5. How to build a 5 figure revenue online business without high overheads like staff and office rental6. and much more...
Time: 10.30am - 12.30pmVenue: 51 Cuppage Road, Cuppage Plaza Singapore 229469



* Required

events.name: AWS Education Group Singapore 1st Meetup
events.description:
We are excited to launch the inaugural AWS Singapore Education User Group to create an active community for institutions to discuss and share their experience on a variety of cloud topics. The objectives of this forum are to: ·  Share learnings and best practices for institutions making a move from on-premise servers to cloud providers. ·  Share the cultural, organizational, and technical challenges unique to Higher Education as institutions who have migrated from on-premise data centers to cloud hosted technology. ·  Discuss new ways of leveraging cloud for innovation and research ·  Create a network for on-going discussions, questions and collaboration. Update 23/03/2017: We have now confirmed the agenda as per below. 11:15 – 11:20 : Welcome & Intro [Peter] 11:20 – 12:00 : Transforming Education in the Cloud [Vincent Quah] 12:00 – 12: 15 : James Cook University AWS Journey [Vijay] 12:15 – 12:30 : AWS in action @ Singapore Polytechnic [Shin] 12:30 – 13:00 : Panel discussion - Peter - Moderator - Vincent - AWS - Julian Lau – AWS Tech - Vijay- 1 private institution - Shin- 1 public institution [potentially TBC, any volunteers from the group would be welcome!] Some potential questions starting from Generic questions to Specific ones: 1. Migrating from on premise to cloud 2. Architecture reference models 3. Architecting for AWS and DevOps : That may include topics like the first deployment on AWS, Lambda capabilities, auto scaling groups. 4. Cloud Native application architecture 5. CI / CD 6. Agenda and timing for next user group as a wrap up. [Peter] 


Who should attend the user group?The user group is an open and collaborative environment to discuss organizational challenges and transitions occurring in education and research as institutions embark on a cloud journey.  The user group is a forum focusing on strategy, processes and best practices, rather than technical deep dives on specific technical solutions.  We welcome anyone from your Teaching and Learning, Research, Corporate & Enterprise teams, Information Technology to engage at our active discussions.
events.location: Marina Bay Sands, Room Sands A5002-5003, 10 Bayfront Avenue, 018956, Singapore

events.name: Learn the Know How to Tap the Disruptive Future of E-Commerce
events.description:
Technologies in internet, social media have change the people's habit in their work, play and ways of life. They have disrupted their lives as millions of jobs will be lost in the year 2020. E-Commerce through internet, social media will be the way people buy and sell, transact rather than through retail shop, megastore, bank branches and so forth.
Don't lose out! Learn E-Commerce to have a back up income source.
Here's what you will discover1. How do you build a truly global e-commerce business without breaking the bank2. Evolution of E-Commerce (Where is it heading and how can you leverage on it ahead of time?)3. How to achieve more than 40 Million USD in online sales revenue in 53 countries online without investing in hosting, website design, autoresponder, apps, inventory, delivery, or paying fees to amazon, Q0010, Lazada, shopify etc.4. Discover an almost Unknown Disruptive e-Commerce Model that is more powerful than Alibaba, Taobao, Amazon or even Wechat5. and much more...
Registration: 1:45pm
Time: 2pm -4pm (Door close at 2pm)
Venue: M38, 38 Jalan Peminpin Singapore 577178

events.name: Integrating Real-Time Data Streams with Spark and Kafka
events.description: Join Talend as they bring you a deep, technical discussion on the real-world data science that underlies modern data-driven organization. Working from weblog data collected and real time-streaming data, and using tools that you can use yourself, Talend will walk through the process of building an analytics package, using Spark and Kafka to collect real-time instrumentation data and produce meaningful results in minutes. RSVP opens: April 4, 2017, Tuesday 6:30pm Time Table   • 1830 – 1900 : Registration • 1900 – 2000 : Integrating Real-Time Data Streams with Spark and Kafka for data-driven organization • 2000 – 2100 : Networking About the speaker: SengJoo Lim A Solutions Engineer at Talend, SengJoo brings over 16 years of diverse experience in pre/post sales solution architecting, customer/partners engagement, programme/project management and service delivery with specialization in new business demand creation especially cloud adoption, various technology consultation, programme development, project implementation and operation management. SengJoo has extensive knowledge on Data Integration, Application Integration, Data Quality, Cloud Integration and Big Data Integration.
events.location: IMDA PIXEL Labs@NDC,  111 Middle Road #03-04, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969

events.name: Getting started with photography accessories
events.description:
Synopsis:
The modern photographer is bogged down with more accessories than ever before. Spend an evening with industry expert, and founder of Red Dot Photo on the best-selling as well as latest photography accessories in the market! Enjoy special deals from LensPens to card readers, to high-tech Wifi transmission gear and fancy straps!


Bio:
Jon CHIA is a self-taught, award-winning photographer based in Singapore. He's been photographing since 2003 and has founded Red Dot Photo in 2008 to source for the best imaging products for photographers. Since 2011, Jon and Red Dot Photo has also ventured into Video/Audio production as well as procuring useful accessories for the modern imaging professional.

Register Here
https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/creative-crew-talks-april-meeting-2017-tickets-33269272289
events.location: Toa Payoh Public Library, 6 Toa Payoh Central, Singapore 319191

events.name: PyData Meetup - April 2017
events.description: Agenda  • 6:45pm - 7:00pm Networking • 7:00pm - 8:00pm Presentation: Exploring Singapore's Open Data APIs • 8:00pm - 9:00pm Presentation:    Search Singularity: Build Visual Search Engine using TensorFlow in GCE for 0$ Title:  Exploring Singapore's Open Data APIs Speaker: Haoyi Li  Synopsis:   Open data is data that is available to anyone, without fee, copyright, or restrictions on usage, and Singapore is one of many governments that have started providing open data feeds. This talk will explore the use of open data from a developers point of view, and show the possibilities and limitations when dealing with Singapore's Open Data APIs. Bio:  Haoyi is a Software Engineer. He previously worked at Dropbox, and is currently working on Fluent, a developer tools startup aiming to re-invent how people explore code online. He blogs as well, and here is his amazing blog: http://www.lihaoyi.com/ Title: Build Visual Search Engine using TensorFlow in GCE for 0$ Speaker: Nachi Nachiappan Synopsis: Have we achieved Search Singularity? Well, we’re still evolving and TensorFlow provides one avenue to achieve this by powering Visual Search similar to what numerous 3rd party services (like ViSenze or Tineye or IQnect) offer. This talk discusses the design, framework, code and image sources to build your own Visual Search Service quickly and host it in Google Cloud. This search engine is built using a python crawler to source ecommerce images, python flask framework for search engine interface and TensorFlow and KNN for similarity search. Further the talk shares concepts on how to achieve the next level of search i.e. ‘Search Singularity’ for ecommerce sites. Bio: Nachi Nachiappan works for Playware – a ‘Gaming as a Service’ provider and hacks and codes on full stack web development and data science. After an extensive stint at Avanade, he ventured into a start-up to digitize paper receipts using mobile NFC and having failed fast, moved into consulting and currently is passionately involved in data science competitions and codes in R and Python and explores new ML libraries. One notably recent ML library he dabbles on is by FB called Prophet for time series analysis. Updates •  Join us on Facebook and Twitter  https://www.facebook.com/groups/pydatasg/https://www.twitter.com/pydatasg Sponsors   Group Sponsor
events.location: Carousell @ Keppel Towers 2, 240 Tanjong Pagar Road #12-00, 088540, Singapore

events.name: Entrepreneur Revolution Workshop
events.description:
Be on the cutting edge to capitalize on the opportunity of the digital gold rush or stay feel trapped by the rat-race?
Which side of the history will you be on?
 ✔️Are you sick of your 9-5 jobs that don’t reward you more ✔️Do you want more time for yourself and your loved ones ✔️Do you want to live a lifestyle you want without financial worries.✔️Are you afraid your job being replaced by technology someday ✔️Are you looking to build an additional source of income
If the answer to any of the above is yes, this workshop is for YOU!
Learn how you can achieve proven, realistic and true financial and life success in Today's Digital Economy even if you have No Business or eCommerce Skills!
Join Winston, a father of 3 lovely daughters, formerly a top real estate agent in Singapore who sold more than 80 million in properties in his first year. The trainer of over 2000 students in real estate for his online marketing course.
Winston had helped create a retail chain of 14 menswear stores and he owns a $40 million USD E-Commerce business. He now travels around the world to inspire and empower entrepreneurs to start their digital business.
Here's what you will discover
1. How do you build a truly global e-commerce business without breaking the bank2. Evolution of E-Commerce (Where is it heading and how can you leverage on it ahead of time?)3. How to achieve Millions USD in online sales revenue in 53 countries online without investing in hosting, website design, autoresponder, apps, inventory, delivery, or paying fees to amazon, Q0010, Lazada, shopify etc.4. Discover an almost Unknown Disruptive e-Commerce Model that is more powerful than Alibaba, Taobao, Amazon or even Wechat5. and much more...
